thread.title: Anthony Martial: I want to remain at Man United 'for as long as possible' - ESPN FC
thread.title_full: Anthony Martial: I want to remain at Man United 'for as long as possible' - ESPN FC

author: Espn Staff
title: Anthony Martial: I want to remain at Man United 'for as long as possible' - ESPN FC
text:
8 minutes ago Anthony Martial: I want to remain at Man United 'for as long as possible' Steve Nicol assesses the strength of Man United's squad depth as the remain competitive on four fronts. 
Manchester United forward Anthony Martial says his ambition is to stay at the club "for as long as possible." 
Martial, 21, has cut a frustrated figure at times this season, having often had to settle for a place on the bench under Jose Mourinho, while he was linked with a loan move away from the club in January. 
The France international, however, has started all of United's previous three games and insists he is happy with life at Old Trafford. 
"I love this club, I love Manchester United," Martial told a news conference ahead of Wednesday's Europa League clash against St Etienne. 
"I love the Manchester United fans, they give me a lot and I really enjoy having them backing me. I try to be as good as possible to make them happy, to satisfy them. Anthony Martial has started in Manchester United's last three games. 
"What I want is to stay at this club for as long as possible." 
Martial admits he has struggled at times to reach the standards he set for United during his first season at the club, but acknowledges he is still developing as a player. 
Asked why his form had dropped, he said: "It is just because last year I played a lot, I had the possibility to play back-to-back games. Now I enjoy playing and we have to wait. 
"I work very hard and I am surrounded by great players, I try to learn and hopefully next season will be better. Indeed I started as a centre-forward but even in Monaco I was a winger. As long as I'm on the pitch I'm happy." 
Follow @ESPNFC on Twitter to keep up with the latest football updates.
